product_name: Wilderness Press 50 Best Short Hikes in Yosemite National Park and Vicinity - 2nd Edition
long_description: The updated edition of. Author: Elizabeth Wenk. Softcover; 228 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Wilderness Press; copyright 2012. Text includes recommended hikes by category, GPS coordinates for each trailhead, 50 trail maps, 7 area-overview maps, at-a-glance hike descriptions and complete route details. Covers the following areas: Lower Yosemite Falls, Panorama Trail, Tuolumne Grove of giant sequoias, Lembert Dome, Twenty Lakes Basin and Mono Lake's South Tufa. .
short_description: The updated edition of 50 Best Short Hikes in Yosemite National Park and Vicinity offers up 50 accessible, easy-to-follow day hikes.
